/**
@class Siesta.Test.NodeJS
@extends Siesta.Test

A base class for testing a NodeJS code.

*/
Class('Siesta.Test.NodeJS', {
    isa         : Siesta.Test,

    does        : [
        Siesta.Test.Observable
    ],

    methods : {

        addListenerToObservable : function (observable, event, listener, isSingle) {
            if (isSingle)
                observable.once(event, listener)
            else
                observable.addListener(event, listener)
        },


        removeListenerFromObservable : function (observable, event, listener) {
            observable.removeListener(event, listener)
        }
    }
});
